forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and clouds mixed. High 16C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 62F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 12C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 52F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 17C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 63F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear early then increasing cloudiness overnight. Low 12C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear evening skies will give way to mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low 52F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 18C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High near 65F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low 13C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low near 55F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 19C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 68F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Low 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 58F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 18C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High around 65F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of rain after midnight. Low 14C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain after midnight. Low 57F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High near 15C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High near 60F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 11C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 51F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady light rain early...then remaining cloudy with a few showers. High 58F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear during the evening followed by mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low around 10C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear during the evening followed by mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low 49F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 16C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 61F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear evening skies will give way to mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low 9C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies early then becoming mostly cloudy later at night. Low 48F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 16C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 61F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 52F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Chance of a shower or two during the morning, followed by partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 62F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 13C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low around 55F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
